Text.Text: This ship will be mistaken for a ship of the Tianming Empire.
An old and traditional style of ship found in Horai. While sturdy, it's hardly up to modern standards â€” but at least no one will think that think that this ship belongs to you.
Pinas
An exceptionally fast gunboat that fires chain shots to break the masts of enemy ships. Excels at pursuing enemies.
A small trade vessel that can transport small amounts of cargo between islands.
Chain Shots
Goodwill's ruthless Freighter
Goodwill's ruthless Freighter
Wu Guowei's Spiteful Junk
[AssetData([NotificationContext CharacterGUID]) Text] has spotted an opportunity in the recent economic crisis.
[AssetData([NotificationContext CharacterGUID]) Text] invites you to settle in the Far East.

Following the reform of the Eastern Trade Agency in the past years, the economic activity with the Tianming Empire has increased significantly, a development that the structures of old have tried to stop by brutal and unjustified force. After Admiral Seymour pacified the region, free and fair growth for all foreign traders is guaranteed by the Treaty of Equality. Sail eastwards to make your claim for a concessionary settlement.
Finish the expedition and enter Horai to progress in your journey.
[AssetData([NotificationContext CharacterGUID]) Text] welcomes you to Horai.

Goodwill provides you with a starting ship to get your first settlements up and running. The sooner this colony is established, the better. The Queen herself wouldn't dare to comb through territory controlled by such a loyal servant.
James Goodwill's Storage Ship
James Goodwill's Lighthouse
The Treaty of Equality
Starting Big Business
E.T.A. Crafting Workshop
TREATY OF EQUALITY SIGNED

A decisive victory for our glorious queen ++ Peace treaty to end the acts of piracy from the Eastern Throne against our national trade routes +++ Concessionary settlement regions granted as reparations, governors to take direct control +++ More on Page 3
Some workers are dismantling this old ship. Probably looking to have some spare parts for repairs in storage later on, aye!
Looking out for spies, lazy workers, and approaching ships in the distance.
Due a long neglect and eventual dereliction, this old monitor was ultimately beached and repurposed as a stationary cannon.
Fully legal drugs against headaches and the common flu.
Artwork, gold and diamonds, all honest acquisitions.
Brewed with special care for quality and purity.
A 20% Import Tax on those? They'll winnow away every coin! How dare you!
Destined for the hands of righteous men, to be used only for peaceful purposes.
Goodwill's Colonial Villa
Contraband
Royal Convoy: Sink this ship to obtain drugs or valuables.
[AssetData([NotificationContext CharacterGUID]) Text] asks if you are ready to transfer the contraband to his storage.
[AssetData([NotificationContext CharacterGUID]) Text] has stored the contraband in his warehouses.
